title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available
description: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available. When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project item is not.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, it is noticed that the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project item is not.
EB: The Close Project menu item should be available when selecting multiple projects.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select P2.
3. Attempt to close the project.
